name: nepali
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a person from Nepal: Yubraj was a proud Nepali. Tens of thousands of Nepalis followed the funeral procession.
[ U ] a language spoken in Nepal and parts of northeastern India: The interpreter spoke Hindi, not Nepali. He told me, in Nepali, "Yes."
More examplesFewer examplesFor generations, Nepalis have travelled abroad to escape poverty. Few non-Nepalis can read Nepali .Prachanda means "the fierce one" in Nepali."Shez! Shez!" shouts a climber. That's Nepali for "drink! drink!"

from or relating to the country of Nepal: She is the daughter of a prominent Nepali politician. We visited the Nepali capital, Kathmandu.
in or relating to the Nepali language: Sagarmatha is the Nepali name for the world's tallest peak. The letter was published in the leading Nepali language newspaper.
More examplesFewer examplesNever open an umbrella in a Nepali home.Nepali cuisine is a very interesting mix of Indian and Chinese fare.Prachanda is a Nepali word with many meanings.
